item.title: Testing Ruby Mixins with Minitest in isolation
item.description: Mixins in Ruby are a very powerful feature. But knowing how to test them sometimes is not so obvious, especially to beginners. I think that this comes from mixins’ nature - they get mixed into other classes. So, if you think that there is a lot to testing mixins and you easily get overwhelmed by it - take it easy, it’s not that hard. Let’s see how easy it is to test mixins, with some help from the lovely Minitest.
